property.name: Card Text
property.value: Superstar Ability: During your opponent's turn, you may RFG 1 Superstar-specific non-Backlash Ringside card to reverse his Superstar-specific card. When you have greater Arsenal cards than him, his maneuvers are -3D and yours are +3D. Your RFG Superstar-specific cards cannot be moved by non-Superstar-specific effects. You can pack non-'Echo' non-'Shield' non-Backstage Roman Reigns cards (ignore 'BASH' in their text), A Family Legacy, No Sell Maneuver, and Backed by Paul Heyman.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you would play a card (even during the Pre-match phase), you may first choose 1: you are considered to have greater Superstar Value or greater Fortitude than your opponent. Your Superstar-specific maneuvers are Trademark Finishers instead. During your turn, you may hide this card to Bury 1 RFG Superstar-specific card. When your Superstar-specific card is successful, you may reveal this card and draw 1- cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Can be played during any Pre-match phase and from Ringside. Before each player's Draw Segment when your opponent has more Arsenal cards, he may overturn 2 cards (this cannot be reversed). If he does not, you may RFG 1 of his non-F: 0 Ring cards. When your opponent's card allows him to choose between multiple effects, you choose for him instead. During your Draw Segment you may draw an additional 3 cards and then discard 3 cards. ACE: During your turn, you may Bury any number of Superstar-specific Ringside and RFG cards, RFG this card, and then end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When overturned, reverse any card or non-Damage card effect. Put this card into your Ring. When this card is in your Ring and your opponent has greater Hand cards, he must discard 1 card to play reversals.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Vegan Superstar Ability: When your opponent's non-Unique card is unsuccessful, he may discard 1 card. If he does not, you may Bury 2 Hand cards and then RFG his unsuccessful card. Once during each of your turns you may RFG 1 of your non-Active D: 2+ Ring cards, and then shuffle Ringside cards into your Arsenal equal to half the RFG card's printed Damage (rounded up). You can pack non-'A.J.' Daniel Bryan-specific Arsenal cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot prevent you from playing this card. When packing this card your 'Stump', 'Vine', 'Plant' and 'Leaf' cards are F: 0, not Face, and ignore 'Can only be played...' in that card's text. When your card is unsuccessful, you may Bury 1 non-'Divine' RFG card. When your Superstar-specific card is RFG for your Ability or your opponent's effect, Bury it instead. Superstar Value +2

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1: Arsenal Search 1 card with the same title as a card in your opponent's Ring, or search his Arsenal for 1 card with the same title as a card in your Ring and RFG it. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, choose both.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card ignores any reversal restrictions or play restrictions from your opponent. Shuffle #- Ringside cards into your Arsenal. # = half of the reversed card's Fortitude (rounded up).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Superstar Ability: Replace 'when successful' with 'when unsuccessful' in the text of your played non-Volley maneuvers and when they are successful, Bury 1- Ringside cards. Before each of your Draw Segments, when your opponent has 5+ greater Hand cards, you may draw 1 card. You can pack Sami Zayn-specific non-Backstage cards (they are WWE instead of NXT), High-Flying Style, and Uncovering the Conspiracy (it is not Heel).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your non-Set-up maneuver is unsuccessful, you may put it under this card face-up. When you play a maneuver with the same title as a card under this card, draw 1- cards and Bury all cards under this card with that title. Once during each of your turns, when you have fewer Hand cards, you may play 1 maneuver under this card as if from hand. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, once during each of your turns you may put 1 Ringside maneuver under this card face-up.

card.name: The Deck is Stacked Against Me!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked or prevented from being played. Your Series of Arm Drags is also considered to be titled Japanese Arm Drag in your Arsenal. When your opponent has greater Arsenal cards, he plays with his hand revealed. When you have greater Arsenal cards, you are considered to have lower Fortitude for your effects. When your opponent successfully played a maneuver last turn, before your Draw Segment, look at the top 3 cards of your Arsenal, and you may Stack or Bury them in any order, or shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an Action, -2F for every non-Pre-match Superstar-specific card in your opponent's Ring, and you may draw # cards, where # = the number of cards in his hand greater than yours. When your non-RMS maneuver with 'successful' in the text becomes successful, you may blank its printed text until the end of the turn. If you do, choose 1 of your non-Unique Ring maneuvers; your successful maneuver gains that text, ignoring reversal restrictions and modifications from your Ability, until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Superstar Ability: Arsenal Search Don't Cross the Boss and put it into your Ring. When your non-Chain card is unsuccessful, during your opponent's next turn he must discard 2 cards to play a card of the same type (When it's a maneuver, the same maneuver type). You can pack Sasha Banks-specific Arsenal cards and Legit Boss (They are WWE instead of NXT), but you cannot pack Elimination Chamber.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is also considered to be Sky's The Limit for your effects. When your opponent's maneuver is unsuccessful and your first card played on your turn is the same maneuver type, it is Multi, and if it is successful, draw 1- cards. When your opponent discards for your Ability, put 1- Ringside maneuvers under this card. You may play maneuvers under this card as if from hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have F: 25+, this card is +10D and a Trademark Finisher instead. Can only be played as a Counter. When played as a Counter (High Risk), cannot be reversed.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: The Legit Boss, Sasha Banks, Eddie Guerrero, Chavo Guerrero

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Los Guerreros. This card requires 3 reversals to be reversed, instead of 2. When played as a Counter, ignore 'completely' in the text of your opponent's reversals to it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Diva Superstar Ability: Do not draw during your Draw Segment. Instead, put 1- RFG non-Unique maneuvers or cards with 'Diva' or 'Female' in the text into your hand, or Promo: 2. Your 'Scissors' High Risks are not Smackdown, and when played as a Counter, ignore the 'can only be played after...' text. Your Skirt the Issue is Unique. You can pack Total Divas and Struck With the Mask, but you cannot pack Drastic Times - Drastic Measures or non-High Risk non-'Kick' 7D+ maneuvers..

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you Promo, you may discard 1 card and then put 1 card not chosen into your hand. During your opponent's turn, you may hide this card to blank the text and damage of his played non-Superstar-specific card. When he has lower Fortitude, he may put his card into his hand and end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Can be played during the Venue phase. When you Promo for your Ability, you may RFG the card not chosen, and then your opponent discards 1 card. When the removed card is Unique, he discards randomly. When it is Superstar-specific, he discards an additional card. When you put an RFG card with 'Diva' or 'Female' in the text into your hand with your Ability, you may Bury 1- Ringside cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Bury #- Ringside cards, where # = half the reversed card's printed Fortitude (rounded up).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent is a Male Superstar, can be played from RFG. When your opponent is a Female Superstar, can only be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is RFG for Princess of Staten Island, Bury it instead. When successful, Bury 2- Ringside cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a maneuver or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle. Your opponent shuffles his hand into his Arsenal and draws half that many cards (rounded up).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, if your next card played is Maintain Hold, you may ignore the 'can only be played after...' text. Reverse any card with 'Pin' or 'Ring' in the text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play this card from RFG. If you do, discard 1 card. Can only be played as a Counter or after a successful maneuver. Cannot be responded to when played after a Superstar-specific card. Bury any number of Hand cards and draw that many cards. ACE: During your turn, you may Bury this card, and then end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, discard this card. When successful, shuffle 4- non-'Divine' RFG cards into your Arsenal.

card.name: The Most Beautiful Woman in WWE

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards 1 card for each of your 'Mella' Ring cards. RFG 1 card in his Ring, reveal up to 2 of your hidden Backstage cards, and your next card played this turn cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful card. Blank that card's text and damage, and end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring, after you Promo, you may Bury 1 Ringside card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Diva Superstar Ability: After damage is applied from your opponent's card, you may put any number of Ringside cards overturned for damage under this card. Before each of your Draw Segments, Bury 2- random cards from under this card. You can pack Somebody Call My Mama!, Funk Is On a Roll!, and Total Divas, but you cannot pack There Is No Escape, First of All or Baghdad, Iraq.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Ring maneuvers cannot be moved or Flipped face-down by your effects. When the first maneuver played on your turn is Foil, it cannot be reversed from Ring or Ringside. When you do not have a maneuver of that type in your Ring, it also cannot be reversed from Hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Can be played during any Pre-match phase. Until after the first Draw Segment of the game, your opponent's effects cannot move cards from your hand or decrease your Starting Hand Size. ACE: When you would Bury non-Superstar-specific cards, you may Stack 1 Hand card and then put 1 of the cards into your hand instead. This effect cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as a Counter. Cannot be reversed from Backlash. During your turn, when this card is in your Ringside, you may Bury 2 Hand cards and then put this card into your Backlash.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: ACE: Once during each of your turns, when this card is in your Ring, you may discard 2 Hand cards and then Arsenal Search 1 non-Trademark Finisher Superstar-specific or Foil maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is F: 0, and when reversed, choose one: Bury this card, or draw 2- cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful card, or as a Counter. When played after a Superstar-specific or Foil maneuver, shuffle 6- Ringside cards into your Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Strike + High Risk / Action / Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter, cannot be reversed from Backlash. As a maneuver, when you have F: 25+, this card is +5D and a Trademark Finisher instead. As an action, this card is F: 0, reveal your bottom 2 Arsenal cards. You may put those cards into your hand and then shuffle this card into your Arsenal, or Bury this card and your opponent discards 1. Reverse any maneuver played after an action.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed from Arsenal by Unique cards, or from Hand, and when your next card played this turn is Maintain Hold, ignore the 'Can only be played...' text. As a reversal, reverse any effect that would prevent a Pinfall Victory (even during your turn), or reverse any Foil card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle this and 1- Ringside Superstar-specific or Foil cards into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your maneuver is unsuccessful, you may put this card from your hand into your Ring. ACE: When you play a maneuver, you may RFG this card and then play another maneuver from Hand. Unless both are reversed, both are considered successful.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played from Hand, reverse any card. When this card reverses a Foil card, you may Arsenal Search 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Superstar Ability: When you reverse your opponent's card from any non-Arsenal area, during your next turn, if your opponent reverses your non-Multi maneuver without a reversal restriction from your effects, or Gut Wrench, from the same area, he Buries 2 Hand cards. You can pack Mixed Martial Arts Specialist, An Ultimate Fighter and Nobody Gets Higher (it is Unique and not Fan Favorite), but you cannot pack Old School Psychology.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Before your first Draw Segment, choose 1: Arsenal Search 2 different non-Unique maneuvers, or when you have fewer Hand cards than your opponent, draw cards until you have equal Hand cards. When your non-Chain maneuver played as a Counter is unsuccessful, you may shuffle 2- Ringside cards into your Arsenal. During your turn, you may hide this card and your opponent cannot play reversals to your next ACE this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, hide this card and choose 2: Flip 1 non-Superstar-specific card in your opponent's Ring face-down, he discards 1 random Backlash card, randomly RFG 1 of his Hand cards, Ringside Search 1 card, or you start the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. When your opponent ends your turn and you have not successfully played or Activated a card this turn, you may Promo: 3 and Bury 1- cards not chosen. ACE: During your opponent's turn, you may RFG this card, ignore any card effect that would move any of your cards to another location with a non-Damage effect, and then end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be played during any Pre-match phase. When you have lower Fortitude, your maneuvers played as a Counter are +#D (# = half the printed Damage of your opponent's reversed card, rounded up.) When your maneuver played as a Counter is successful, he overturns 1 card. During his turn, he may discard 1 Backlash card to blank this card until the start of his next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as a Counter or after a successful maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as a Counter. When your opponent has 10+ greater Fortitude, this card is F: 0. When this card is in your Ring, ignore 'non-Arsenal' in your Ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -10F. Reverse any Grapple or Submission, discard 1 card and Promo: 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a maneuver or played as a Counter, cannot be reversed from Backlash.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, -5F, Bury this card and 2- Ringside cards, draw 1 card and your opponent discards 1 and overturns 2.

card.name: The Bro That Runs The Show

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1- non-WWE cards from his Ring into his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: NXT UK Superstar Ability: Each turn, your maneuvers are +#D, and your opponent's reversals are -#D (# = the number of cards you overturned on your opponent's last turn). Your opponent may ignore reversal restrictions from Arsenal. Your Double Clothesline Takedown is Unique, and your opponent's maneuvers with 'reversed' in the text are considered to be titled Double Clothesline Takedown for its effects.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your maneuver is at least +1D from your Ability and is unsuccessful, Shuffle 2- random Ringside cards into your Arsenal (When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, you choose the cards instead). After you overturn any number of cards for the effect of your reversal, you may Bury that many random Ringside cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your opponent's maneuvers are -#D, and your non-Unique maneuvers played as a Counter (Arsenal) are -#F, where # = his number of non-Backlash Ring reversals (max. 3). When you have 20+ lower Fortitude, he cannot play Hybrid reversals.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful maneuver. Blank that maneuver's text and damage. Overturn 10- cards. End your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring, your first maneuver each turn that is at least +5D from your Ability is Multi, and ignore 'Completely' in the text of your opponent's reversals played to it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter, this card is a High Risk instead. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, can only be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter (Arsenal), this card is a High Risk instead and cannot be reversed from hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed from Backlash. When you have F: 20+, this card is a Trademark Finisher instead. During your opponent's turn, when this card is in your Ring or Ringside and you overturn 5+ cards for his effects, you may put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -10F and can only be reversed by 2 reversal cards. As a reversal, reverse any non-Unique maneuver played as a Counter (non-Arsenal) and overturn 3- cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle this card and 3- Ringside cards into your Arsenal. As a reversal, when overturned and you have lower Fortitude, reverse any card or card effect, put this card into your hand, and overturn 3- cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Arsenal Search 3- cards and RFG them, then search your opponent's Arsenal for the same number of non-Unique cards and RFG them.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your hand and your maneuver is unsuccessful, you may put this card into your Ring, and then continue your turn and your opponent's reversal deals no damage. ACE: During your turn, when this card is in your Ring, you may put it into your Ringside, and then Ringside Search 1 maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, this card is -4F and when it reverses from Arsenal, put this card into your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: NXT UK SSA: During any turn, when your card effect allows your opponent to move cards from his hand or Ringside, the cards are chosen randomly. When your non-Hybrid Superstar-specific maneuver is unsuccessful, you may Bury 2- random Ringside cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your maneuvers with 7+ lines of text are considered Superstar-specific for your effects. When your played maneuver would allow you to discard any number of cards, you may instead reveal the same number of cards and draw that number.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot respond to this card. As an action, -5F, Bury 2- Ringside cards and your opponent discards 1 card. When NXT UK Championship Title Belt is in your Ring, double those numbers. When this card is in your Ring, your opponent discards randomly when he Activates Sustained Damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card reverses from Arsenal, put it into your Ring. When this card is in your Ring, and you have lower Fortitude, your Superstar-specific maneuvers are considered Unique for your opponent's reversals.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: NXT UK SSA: Do not draw cards during your Draw Segment; instead, look at your top 7 Arsenal cards, put 1 into your hand, and shuffle. When you have 7+ lower Fortitude, your Fortitude is considered +7 for overturning reversals, and when you have 14+ lower Fortitude, it is +7 for playing cards. You can pack Strong Style Suplex and Glorious Moustache.

card.name: The Don of British Strong Style

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, your printed D: 7 cards titled Airplane Spin, Belly to Back Suplex, Clothesline, Lariat, and Modified Suplex are not Heat. When this card is revealed, they are Superstar-specific, can be played regardless of Fortitude, and are Strikes for your NXT UK Tag Team Titles. During your turn, when you have 7- Hand cards, you may hide this card and then shuffle your hand and 7- Ringside cards into your Arsenal and draw 7- cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card you can pack NXT UK Tag Team Titles, but you cannot pack There is No Escape. Cannot be blanked or prevented from being played by your opponent. Can be played from Ringside. At the end of the Pre-Match phase, draw 4 cards and then Bury 3 Hand cards. When you have lower Fortitude, your opponent must discard 1 maneuver to play Hand reversals to your Superstar-specific maneuvers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle 7- RFG cards into your Arsenal. As a reversal, -7F, when overturned reverse any Unique card, and put this card into your Ring. ACE: When your opponent plays a maneuver, you may Bury this card, and then his maneuver is considered to be titled Belly to Back Suplex for your reversals.

card.name: Say Goodbye to the Bad Guy

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card you are a Legend. When you have lower Fortitude or fewer Hand cards, ignore 'and it is not reversed from Arsenal' in your Ability; when you do not, instead ignore 'once'. When your opponent successfully plays a non-Reversal non-F: 0 card, you may hide this card, put his card into his Ringside, and end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have lower Fortitude, you may put this card into your Ring when you use your Ability. Put the reversed card into your hand and Bury the overturned cards. When this card is in your Ring, your maneuvers are -3F, and Bury any cards overturned for damage from his non-Superstar-specific reversals. When you have 5+ lower Fortitude and he would choose for Tranquilo Style, you choose for him. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, choose both. ACE: When you have lower Fortitude and your maneuver is reversed from Arsenal, you may overturn 1 card and then you are considered to have ended your turn for Tranquilo Style.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card you may pack 'Injury' cards in your Backstage. They can be played from Backstage as if from Hand (or Backlash if applicable), and they do not take up slots in your Ring. When you have no Ring maneuvers, your Fortitude is considered 0 for your effects. Replace 'Can only be played...' in the text of your 'Injury' cards with 'Can only be played after a successful Multi maneuver, or as a Counter (Superstar-specific reversal).'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card ignores any 'can only be reversed' restriction from a card. When played from Ringside, reverse any maneuver, even if it cannot be reversed. ACE: During your opponent's turn, you may RFG 6 Ringside Heat cards to reverse any maneuver. When you do, put 1- RFG cards into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1: Arsenal Search 1 non-Unique Hybrid maneuver, or RFG 1 of your opponent's Ringside cards. When you have lower Fortitude, choose both.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is considered to have 'Dynamic' in the title. When this card is reversed, your opponent can only play maneuvers from Hand during his next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, if your next card played this turn is a maneuver, it is a Trademark Finisher instead. As a reversal, when you have lower Fortitude, reverse any non-Trademark Finisher maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your Hybrid maneuver is unsuccessful, you may put this card from your hand into your Ring. When this card is in your Ring, your opponent cannot play D: 2+ reversals to your Hybrid maneuvers. When your Hybrid maneuver is successful, shuffle this card into your Arsenal This card is considered a maneuver when it is in your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card you are a WCW Superstar, and you can pack Little She Devil (ignore 'can only be played...' in its text). Your Superstar-specific cards, and your first Strike played each turn are considered WCW for your effects. During your turn you may hide this card and then shuffle any Ringside Face or Heel cards into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, can be played from Ringside. Your opponent Buries all cards in his hand except 3. ACE: During your opponent's turn, you may put this card into your Ringside to reverse an ACE and end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During your turn, when this card is in your Ringside, you may shuffle it into your Arsenal As an action, Arsenal Search 1 Strike, then shuffle this card into your Arsenal. As a reversal, When overturned, reverse any non-Unique maneuver. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, reverse any maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is considered a Strike for your effects. When your opponent is Female, this card is Multi and can only be reversed by 2 reversal cards. When your opponent is a Diva, can only be reversed from Arsenal. When your opponent is Male, +3 Stun Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All players shuffle their hands into their Arsenal, and draw that many cards (your opponent draws 2 less). When a Unique card is Flipped face-down, you may Bury 1 Ringside card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful maneuver, or as a Counter (hand). This card is -1F for each of your face-down cards, and +1D for each of his face-down cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card reverses, after damage is applied you may Flip 1 card in your Ring face-down and shuffle this card into your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring, your maneuvers are +1 Stun Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -3F for each face-down card in your Ring. As a reversal, reverse any non-Unique card.
